类 VirtualPet

java.lang.Object
VirtualPet
public class VirtualPet extends Object
Represents a virtual pet with a name, type, and various states such as health, sleep, fullness, and happiness. Each pet type may have different decay rates and behavior patterns.

Example usage: 


 // Create a new virtual pet
 VirtualPet myPet = new VirtualPet("Buddy", PetType.DOG);

 // Set the pet's name
 myPet.setName("Charlie");

 // Get the current health of the pet
 int currentHealth = myPet.getHealth();

 // Update the pet's sleep value
 myPet.setSleep(80);

作者:
ZHenkang Xu

    • VirtualPet

      public VirtualPet(String name, PetType petType)
      Constructs a new VirtualPet instance with specified attributes and initializes its state.
      参数:
      name - The name of the virtual pet.
      petType - The type of the virtual pet, defining its specific behavior and decay rates.

      返回:
      The name of the pet.

    • getIsPlayColdDown

      public boolean getIsPlayColdDown()
      Checks if the cooldown condition is active.
      返回:
      true if the cooldown is active, false otherwise.

    • setName

      public String setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the virtual pet to the specified value.
      参数:

      返回:
      The updated name of the virtual pet.

      返回:

      public int getMaxHappiness()
      Retrieves the maximum happiness level of the virtual pet.
      返回:
      The maximum happiness value as an integer.

    • getSleepDecayRate

      public int getSleepDecayRate()
      Retrieves the sleep decay rate of the virtual pet. This value determines how quickly the pet's sleep level decreases over time.
      返回:
      The sleep decay rate as an integer.

    • getHappinessDecayRate

      public int getHappinessDecayRate()
      Retrieves the happiness decay rate of the virtual pet. This value represents how quickly the pet's happiness level decreases over time.
      返回:
      The happiness decay rate as an integer.

    • getHungerDecayRate

      public int getHungerDecayRate()
      Retrieves the hunger decay rate of the virtual pet. This value indicates how quickly the pet's fullness level decreases over time.
      返回:
      The hunger decay rate as an integer.

    • getCurrentState

      public VirtualPet.PetState getCurrentState()
      Retrieves the current state of the virtual pet.
      返回:
      The current state of the pet as a PetState enumeration value.

    • goSleep

      public void goSleep()
      The pet enters a state of sleep and remains in this state until the sleep value reaches its maximum.

    • feed

      public void feed(FoodItem food)
      Feeds the virtual pet with the provided food item to increase its fullness. The pet cannot be fed if it is in an ANGRY, SLEEPING, or DEAD state.
      参数:
      food - The FoodItem to feed the pet. Must be non-null and have a positive quantity.

    • giveGift

      public void giveGift(GiftItem gift)
      Gives a gift to the virtual pet to increase its happiness level. The action will only execute if the pet is not in a SLEEPING or DEAD state. If the provided gift is null or has a non-positive quantity, the method will notify that no gift is available and terminate.
      参数:
      gift - The gift item to be given to the pet. Must be non-null and have a positive quantity.

    • takeToVet

      public void takeToVet()
      If a player takes their pet to the veterinarian, the pet's health will increase by a certain amount. After using this command, the pet will be unable to use its abilities for a certain period of time until the cooldown is over.

    • play

      public void play(int playValue)
      Allows the pet to play, increasing its happiness up to the maximum happiness level. This method considers the pet's current state and ensures the play action respects cooldowns.
      参数:
      playValue - The amount of happiness to increase as a result of playing.

    • exercise

      public void exercise(int healthBoost)
      Performs exercise for the virtual pet, increasing its health and reducing its sleep and fullness levels. The pet's state is updated after the exercise. Exercise will have no effect if the pet is dead or sleeping.
      参数:
      healthBoost - The amount by which the pet's health should increase, capped at the pet's maximum health.

    • updateState

      public void updateState()
      Updates the current state of the virtual pet based on its health, sleep, fullness, and happiness levels. The state is modified as follows: - If health is zero, the pet transitions to the DEAD state. - If sleep is zero and the pet is not already in the DEAD state, the pet transitions to the SLEEPING state. - If fullness is zero and the pet is not already in the DEAD state, the pet transitions to the HUNGRY state. - If happiness is zero and the pet is not already in the DEAD state, the pet transitions to a state representing low happiness. - If none of the above conditions are met, the pet's state is checked and reset to NORMAL if applicable.

    • decreaseStatsOverTime

      public void decreaseStatsOverTime()
      Decreases the virtual pet's various attributes over time, based on its current state and predefined decay rates. This method is responsible for adjusting the pet's health, sleep, happiness, and fullness levels and ensures they do not fall below zero. The following changes are applied: - If the pet is in a HUNGRY state and health is greater than zero, health decreases. - Sleep decreases unless the pet is sleeping. - Happiness decreases regardless of the pet's current state. - Fullness decreases due to hunger over time. After modifying the attributes, the pet's state is updated by invoking the updateState method.
